description:
Season: 31
Original Air Date: 10/30/2017

Liam feels betrayed by Bill and Wyatt when he learns that they made a major business decision without considering his opinion.  Brooke begins to have second thoughts about divorcing Bill when she learns from Steffy that he and Liam have reconciled.  Bill attempts to get Liam on board with him and Wyatt’s by providing facts behind their overruling decision.  Shirley calls Sally out on her feeling for Liam and encourages her to pursue him in spite of his marital status.
